body:
Under certain conditions, trying to pass a cdef function to an arbitrary function may cause a compiler crash. This is the most minimal reproducing case I've found:

```
cdef void func(double[:] arr):
    pass

def xyzzy(f):
    pass

xyzzy(func)
```

Cython crashes with this message:

```
Compiler crash in AnalyseExpressionsTransform

File 'Nodes.py', line 430, in analyse_expressions: StatListNode(cython_pass_cdef.pyx:1:0)
File 'Nodes.py', line 4746, in analyse_expressions: ExprStatNode(cython_pass_cdef.pyx:7:5)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 519, in analyse_expressions: SimpleCallNode(cython_pass_cdef.pyx:7:5,
    analysed = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 5105, in analyse_types: SimpleCallNode(cython_pass_cdef.pyx:7:5,
    analysed = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 914, in coerce_to_pyobject: TupleNode(cython_pass_cdef.pyx:7:5,
    is_sequence_constructor = 1,
    is_temp = 1,
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 7423, in coerce_to: TupleNode(cython_pass_cdef.pyx:7:5,
    is_sequence_constructor = 1,
    is_temp = 1,
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 914, in coerce_to_pyobject: NameNode(cython_pass_cdef.pyx:7:10,
    cf_maybe_null = True,
    initialized_check = True,
    is_name = True,
    name = 'func',
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 1809, in coerce_to: NameNode(cython_pass_cdef.pyx:7:10,
    cf_maybe_null = True,
    initialized_check = True,
    is_name = True,
    name = 'func',
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 875, in coerce_to: NameNode(cython_pass_cdef.pyx:7:10,
    cf_maybe_null = True,
    initialized_check = True,
    is_name = True,
    name = 'func',
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)
File 'ExprNodes.py', line 12499, in __init__: CoerceToPyTypeNode(is_temp = 1,
    result_is_used = True,
    use_managed_ref = True)

Compiler crash traceback from this point on:
  File "/home/blum/chofreither/.local/lib64/python3.4/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 12499, in __init__
    if not arg.type.create_to_py_utility_code(env):
  File "/home/blum/chofreither/.local/lib64/python3.4/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 2854, in create_to_py_utility_code
    safe_typename = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '__', self.declaration_code("", pyrex=1))
  File "/home/blum/chofreither/.local/lib64/python3.4/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 2695, in declaration_code
    arg.type.declaration_code("", for_display, pyrex = pyrex))
  File "/home/blum/chofreither/.local/lib64/python3.4/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/PyrexTypes.py", line 625, in declaration_code
    assert not pyrex
AssertionError:
```
title: Compiler crash when passing a cdef function to another function
